text: There’s no automatic support. But you can use <https://github.com/JuliaIO/CodecZlib.jl> to compress the body yourself and send it

text: yeah, your best bet is to do verbose on both curl & HTTP.jl and see what the difference is. usually you need to set the content-type/transport-type just right to get things to work
